p: One fungus Candida albicans (ATCC 10231) was used for antifungal tests, the results showed that compound 177 exhibited significant antifungal activity against C. albicans with the MIC value of 2.62 μg/mL. The positive control for antifungal tests was used by ketoconazole with MIC value of 0.10 μg/mL [ 54].
